item.title: Age of Empires IV: Knights of Cross and Rose
item.description:
Title: Age of Empires IV: Knights of Cross and Rose
Genre: Strategy
Developer: Forgotten Empires , Climax Studios , Relic Entertainment , World's Edge
Publisher: Xbox Game Studios
Franchise: Age of Empires
Release Date: Apr 8, 2025




About This Content

Embark on an epic journey with Age of Empires IV: Knights of Cross and Rose, the newest DLC that puts you in command of two well-known armies inspired by history. Whether you’re a seasoned strategist or new to the series, this DLC delivers rich, historically inspired content that can be enjoyed across a variety of modes.

Featuring variant civilizations that expand upon the concept, this DLC introduces the Knights Templar and House of Lancaster, which innovate upon the French and English. These armies bring with them a war chest full of unique units, game mechanics, and strategies. Command the indomitable Knights Templar with their valorous crusaders and blend of European military traditions that offer a wide range of possible strengths. Marshal the resolute forces of the House of Lancaster, steeped in the turmoil of The War of the Roses and possessing unparalleled ranged tactics; the House of Lancaster utilizes their thriving economy to acquire technological advantages little known in Europe at the time. Both variant civilizations offer engaging new combat opportunities, ensuring every match is a clash of wits and courage alike.

Live the legacy of these iconic armies in the new action-packed game mode: Historical Battles. Rally the Knights Templar and House of Lancaster in missions inspired by iconic historic confrontations. Lead the Knights Templar in the Battle of Montgisard as they stave off Saladin’s forces. Ensure the House of Lancaster’s survival against the Yorkists after a calamitous defeat at Towton.

Designed to give you a glimpse into pivotal moments in history, these four missions offer the opportunity to challenge your skills in repeat plays as you try new strategies and earn medals. Each mission includes an optional Conqueror Mode for the especially brave of heart.

What's more, this DLC enriches your skirmish and multiplayer encounters with 10 new maps. Navigate diverse terrains that range from lush countrysides to treacherous battlegrounds, each demanding tailored strategies and keen insight. Whether you're skirting the flanks in a multiplayer clash or plotting a singleplayer siege on hallowed historical grounds, these maps ensure there's always a fresh field to test your mettle.

With this new content, Knights of Cross and Rose, is set to captivate both new and returning players alike. The Historical Battles offer concentrated yet intense challenges for those who prefer solo play that emphasizes adept strategy, while the Knights Templar and House of Lancaster expand further upon the unique elements of variant civilizations. Expect an immersive experience with these compelling additions to the beloved Age of Empires IV universe—a true testament to the franchise's continual growth and innovation.

Secure your journey into the heart of medieval conflict, where legends are forged, and empires rise from the crucible of battle. Build massive armies. Command your troops. Claim your place in history with Age of Empires IV: Knights of Cross and Rose.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 64bit | Windows 11 64bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-6300U or AMD Ryzen 5 2400G | CPU with AVX support required
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Intel HD 520 or AMD Radeon RX Vega 11
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 50 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10 64bit | Windows 11 64bit
    • Processor: 3.6 GHz 6-core (Intel i5) or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 | CPU with AVX support required
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 970 GPU or AMD Radeon RX 570 GPU with 4GB of VRAM
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 50 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 4 GB of video RAM and 16 GB of system RAM

item.title: South of Midnight
item.description:
Title: South of Midnight
Genre: Action , Adventure
Developer: Compulsion Games
Publisher: Xbox Game Studios
Release Date: Apr 8, 2025




About This Game

UNRAVEL THE PAST

From the creators of Contrast and We Happy Few, South of Midnight is a spellbinding third person action-adventure game set in the American Deep South.

As Hazel, you will explore the mythos and encounter creatures of Southern folklore in a macabre and fantastical world. When disaster strikes her hometown, Hazel is called to become a Weaver: a magical mender of broken bonds and spirits. Imbued with these new abilities, Hazel will confront and subdue dangerous creatures, untangle the webs of her own family's shared past and - if she's lucky - find her way to a place that feels like home.

A DARK MODERN FOLKTALE

When a hurricane rips through Prospero, Hazel is pulled into a Southern Gothic world of memory made real and must embark on a journey to rescue her mother and safeguard her hometown. In this folktale for modern times, Hazel will need to reconcile the weight of family, history, and legacy against her own identity.

CONFRONT MYTHICAL CREATURES

Wield an ancient power to restore creatures and uncover the traumas that consume them. Cast weaving magic to fight destructive Haints, explore the diverse regions of the South, and reweave the tears in the Grand Tapestry.

HAUNTING BEAUTY OF THE GOTHIC SOUTH

Discover the lush, decayed county of Prospero and its locals. Experience a crafted visual style, touching storytelling, and immersive music inspired by the complex and rich history of the South.



Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10/11
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1300X / Intel i3-8100
    • Memory: 12 GB RAM
    • Graphics: AMD RX 580 / Nvidia GTX 1060
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 60 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Performance scales with higher-end systems
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10/11
    • Processor: AMD 1600X / Intel i5-7600K
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: AMD RX 6600 / Nvidia RTX 2060 / Intel Arc A580
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 60 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Performance scales with higher-end systems

item.title: Big Rigs: Over the Road Racing
item.description:
Title: Big Rigs: Over the Road Racing
Genre: Action , Adventure , Racing
Developer: Stellar Stone
Publisher: Margarite Entertainment
Franchise: Margarite Entertainment
Release Date: Apr 8, 2025




About This Game

Get ready for some brake jamm'in, CB talk'in, convoy roll'in action across America! From Portland Oregon to Miami Florida, you'll be hauling loads and trying to stay one step ahead of the law as you climb into your Big Rig for non-stop driving action. And if that's not enough, you'll also be able to race your modified Rig on one of 5 different tracks for the ultimate driving rush as you crush the competition and set a new track record!

FEATURES:

🚛 4 BIG RIG trucks with trailers
🛣️ 4 unique routes : Desert, Forest, Plains, and Cities
🌅 Day & Night driving —a real challenge for even the most experienced truckers
🛤️ Various maps of highways and byways across America
🚔 3 intense levels with a variety of wicked challenges

Special thanks to: GXZ95, Rod, Elke1131, and Cris_Kaiju.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster processor or SoC.
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 500 (Gen9)
    • Storage: 400 MB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

item.title: Kitchen Sync: Aloha!
item.description:
Title: Kitchen Sync: Aloha!
Genre: Casual , Indie , RPG , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Lemonpepper Games
Publisher: Lemonpepper Games
Release Date: Apr 7, 2025




About This Game

Adventure across the lush Hawaiian island of Maikai and lead a team of chefs through the challenges of running a pop-up restaurant. Build new relationships and rediscover the bonds that make a kitchen feel like home.

Befriend and recruit a cast of colorful chefs, each with their unique specialties. As you guide them through tropical cooking venues, you’ll uncover their personal stories and witness the bonds that form within this close-knit community. As the chefs collaborate and support one another, their bonds deepen and friendships grow…some may even find unexpected romance.

Whip up some mouthwatering Hawaiian dishes as you explore Maikai's various venues and overcome challenges! Serve Spam Musubi, Mac Salad, Loco Moco, and more. Craft your menu and customize your recipes by adding your own Twists. Optimize your kitchen layout, upgrade your appliances, and level up your chefs' abilities to fully master every kitchen.

Need a break from the kitchen? Strengthen your bond with your team and enjoy what the island has to offer. Go on a fishing trip or a nature hike. Each mini-game lets you grow your relationship with the chefs you befriend on your journey.

Play as either Kai or Kala, two siblings on their quest to bring their family’s restaurant back to life. Along the way, you’ll complete meaningful side quests, experiment with recipes, and craft dishes as unforgettable as the people you’ll meet. Start as the new eatery on the island and grow your restaurant into a local gem.

On Maikai, cooking is more than just preparing meals. It’s about growing relationships and embracing the spirit of community.

  • Cozy Cooking RPG - The narrative focus of visual novel meets strategic kitchen management. Level up characters, customize kitchen layouts, and build relationships to uncover stories.

  • Over 30 Different Kitchens - Cook at beaches, restaurants, malls, food trucks, resorts, and more, all set against the beauty of a lush Hawaiian island.

  • Wholesome and Heartwarming Story - A journey of food, family, and discovering joy in the connections that bring people together.

  • No Stress Kitchen Management - Play at your own pace with a timer that pauses.

  • Grow Relationships - Build stronger bonds between party members or find love with different romantic endings!

  • Mini-games - Participate in island activities like fishing and hiking with fellow chefs.

  • 3 Different Difficulty Settings - Turn off all timers and relax with Cozy mode or test your skills with Hard Boiled mode.

Join our community, report issues, or follow news for the game on Discord!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 512MB of VRAM
    • Storage: 1 GB available space

MacOS

    Minimum:
    • OS: macOS Monterey
    • Processor: Intel Processor
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM

item.title: PEPPERED: an existential platformer
item.description:
Title: PEPPERED: an existential platformer
Genre: Adventure , Indie , Free To Play
Developer: Mostly Games
Publisher: Mostly Games , Black Soup
Release Date: Apr 7, 2025




About This Game

ABOUT

PEPPERED is an existential platformer where you have ONE SHOT at everything.

Every choice, every boss battle, and every failure impact the branching plotline and determine how the story will go and how it will end. Will you save the world - or fail miserably?

SYNOPSIS

Seeing apathy in the face of doomsday, an office intern decides to save the world by themselves. But the world responds by summoning the police, angry mobs, and the media, branding them as a terrorist.

KEY FEATURES

■ BRANCHING NARRATIVE
Multiple endings. Multiple story routes. Your failures and choices affect the story, which branches out heavily — sometimes taking you to completely unique locations with unique scenes, characters, or gameplay mechanics.

■ PLATFORMING ACTION
Run. Jump. Die. Scream at the screen.

■ ONE-SHOT BOSS FIGHTS
Challenging boss fights! If you lose, the game will not reset or give you a second chance — it will go on, incorporating your loss and changing the story accordingly.

■ CHOICES
Make story choices, ranging from dialogue responses to actions. These will either affect the characters, the scene's outcome, or the ending you get.

■ STEALTH SECTIONS
Get caught, sneak past, or find a secret solution. Every section features a unique character, permanent outcomes, and dumb gags.

■ EXPLORATION
Immerse yourself in a bizarre world full of weirdos and sad people! Talk with colorful NPCs, poke around the environment, or ignore it all.

■ COMPLETELY RANDOM CR*P
Maybe you'll have to use a shopping cart to run away from thugs? Perhaps you'll have to write a presentation or gamble with a street corner lunatic? Who knows? (I do.)

■ AN OFFICE CHAIR
You can spin in it.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Very mild slapstick violence and cartoony gore (minimal amount.)



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: TBA

MacOS

    Minimum:
    • OS: TBA
* Starting February 15, 2024, the Steam Client will no longer support 32-bit games or macOS 10.14 or lower.
